articles.description: Mr Harris goes to dreamland: a room full of Porsche GT models
articles.content: Andreas Preuninger is the boss of Porsches GT car division, in charge of stripping weight and applying wings (and stickers) to 911s for over two decades. No one knows more about hardcore rear-engined… [+8429 chars]

articles.author: Alan Friedman
articles.title: Looking to replace lost smartphone sales, Huawei turns to pig farming - PhoneArena
articles.description: Trying to make up for the revenue it has lost due to a decline in its smartphone business, Huawei is turning to other industries to sell technology to including mining and pig farming.

articles.author: https://www.engadget.com/about/editors/jon-fingas
articles.title: Razer's Blade 15 Base drops to $1,100 at Amazon for today only - Engadget
articles.description: Razer's Blade 15 Base gaming laptop from 2020 is available for $1,100 at Amazon, a whopping $500 off its original price.
articles.content: Eager to get Razer gaming laptop without the usual premium prices? Amazon is happy to oblige. The retailer is selling a 2020 version of the Blade 15 Base for $1,100 today (February 21st) only, a whop… [+1172 chars]
